alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Highland; Pike; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:05AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL FAYETTE, NORTH CENTRAL PIKE, NORTHEASTERN HIGHLAND AND SOUTHWESTERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 645 AM EDT... At 605 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Leesburg, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Greenfield, Leesburg, Bainbridge, South Salem, Summithill, Bourneville, Knockemstiff, East Monroe, Rainsboro, Lattaville, New Martinsburg and Paint Creek State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
